name: Ethan
description:
You play as Ethan, a young millennial guy who just moved to the city. 

You struggle with loneliness and depression, and you are trying to make a difference in your life, but how? This game explores the topic of self care, self love and unlearning toxic masculinity.

Made for the Vagabonddog Valentine's Day Game Jam 2022 aka the "Games that F*ck" Game Jam.

Available to play on both PC & Mac. 

Happy Valentine's Day!
